entities.name: honeydukes
entities.description: Honeydukes is a shop that they have used many times. It is located right outside this room.

entities.name: moony
entities.description: Moony is one of the names mentioned on the map, along with Wormtail, Padfoot, and Prongs.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is one of the names mentioned on the map, along with Moony, Padfoot, and Prongs.

entities.name: padfoot
entities.description: Padfoot is one of the names mentioned on the map, along with Moony, Wormtail, and Prongs.

entities.name: prongs
entities.description: Prongs is one of the names mentioned on the map, along with Moony, Wormtail, and Padfoot.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is a member of Harry's group and is mentioned as saying 'We owe them so much'.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is a member of Harry's group and is mentioned as saying 'Noble men, working tirelessly to help a new generation of law-breakers'.

entities.name: mrs. norris
entities.description: Mrs. Norris is the cat that Filch owns and is being controlled by the map.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is a teacher at Hogwarts who is mentioned as owning Mrs. Norris.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is a member of Harry's group and is being impersonated by Fred.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story and is mentioned as watching the map.

relationships.description: George says 'We owe them so much' which implies that they are grateful to Moony, Wormtail, Padfoot, and Prongs.
Fred is controlling Mrs. Norris through the map.
Harry is watching the map as it moves and shows him different locations.
Filch owns Mrs. Norris, which implies that he has control over her.
Fred is impersonating Percy in order to tease Harry.
Harry and George are planning to visit Honeydukes, as mentioned by George when he says 'See you in Honeydukes'.
